也會發生此事件時的儲存格擷取或其方法呼叫。This event also occurs when the cell is retrieved or its method is called. 當您處理事件，屬性會初始化與儲存格的值。When you handle the event, the property is initialized with the cell value. 如果您提供從儲存格的值來顯示值的自訂轉換，將要轉換的值，以確保新值的儲存格所指定型別的屬性屬性。If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell property. 若要指出格式化任何其他值是必要，設定屬性`true`。To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the property to `true`. 此事件處理常式完成時，如果是`null`或不正確的型別，或屬性是`false`、使用格式化， ， ，和屬性所傳回的儲存格樣式屬性，使用儲存格初始化屬性。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is formatted using the , , , and properties of the cell style returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 值為何屬性，所傳回的物件的顯示屬性屬性用來呈現資料格。Regardless of the value of the property, the display properties of the object returned by the property are used to render the cell. 如需有關自訂格式化使用事件，請參閱[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要避免效能的負面影響，在處理此事件時，存取參數傳遞的事件處理常式，而不是直接存取儲存格的儲存格。To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly. 若要自訂格式化的使用者指定的值轉換成實際的資料格的值，處理事件。To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB：
